entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump Remember, the man with the middle school nicknames who likes to loosely throw around the term 'do nothing Democrats', did nothing in Feb to combat the Coronavirus. Big reason why we're where we are, other countries reacted properly w/the same info from WHO.

#TrumpLiesPeopleDie
